item.title: Visualizing One Hundred Years of Cincinnati Maps
item.description: #map{ width: 100%; height: 600px } #date_slider_container { position: absolute; top: 124px; left: 8px; z-index: 1000; } #date_slider{ margin: 14px; height: 200px; } #selected_year{ font-size:20px; color: grey; background-color:white; font-weight: bold; position: absolute; bottom: 200px; left: 34px; border-radius: 10px; padding-right: 0.
